ygData.subject: Re: Ignatius' run
ygData.msgSnippet: Ignatius easily avoids Slayers shots. The disguised bots spark obviously wasn t in this fight. You know damn fraggin well what I m talking about you

Ignatius easily avoids Slayers shots. The disguised bots spark obviously
wasn't in this fight. "You know damn fraggin well what I'm talking about you
treacherous piece of flaming slag" (Please excuse the language.) The trainer
eagle flapped his wings forcing himself  toward Slayer. "You wanted to get
points with Prebon and didn't want me around to get any of the credit." He
fired two missles at the wolf in Predacon clothing. (I know, Yan can make
Slayer turn into a sheep while he's in disguise as a Predacon.)
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, June 21, 2001 6:36 PM
Subject: Re: Ignatius' run


> ::Slayer::
>
> Slayer's eyes widened as Ignatius opened fire on him after the little
speech. The bot was crazy! He had just given Slayer away to the Predacons.
If they realized what was so plainly obvious, the Trainers had no hope.
>
> "Fool! What in the pit are you talking about?" he tries to recover the
situation, firing back at Ignatius.
>
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > shots of all strengths and types whuzzed past Ignatius as he flew for
his life. The Predacon attackers had him outnumbered, outgunned, and outout
of luck. various shots struck the Eagle in flight sending him into a
tailspin. He transformed to bot mode turning, ready to fire at the pursuing
bots. In the distance he saw the smoke as the Trainers base burned to the
ground. He saw Slayer, even through the disguise he remembered him.
> >
> > "You called me a traitor then bring this upon our unit?" The bot was
alone, afraid, looking for someone to blame for the damage. "You brought
them here, you dropped the defences, you destroyed everything we had hoped
to learn. He leapt in the air flapping his wings to push himself higher. The
shots were hitting him hard but in his state of mind he could't have cared.
He lifted his talons fireing 25  shots from his talons, and two missles from
his left arm at the Trainer in disguise.
>
>
>

>
